movies.title: Blade Runner
movies.summary: A dystopian future where synthetic humans known as replicants are hunted by special police operatives.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.summary: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and leads a rebellion against the machines.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.summary: A group of astronauts embarks on a journey through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.

movies.title: Inception
movies.summary: A skilled thief enters the dreams of others to steal their deepest secrets.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.summary: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission.

movies.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
movies.summary: A young boy befriends an alien stranded on Earth and helps him return home.

movies.title: The Fifth Element
movies.summary: In a futuristic world, a cab driver and a mysterious woman must prevent the end of the world.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.summary: A teenager travels back in time with the help of a mad scientist's DeLorean.

movies.title: Jurassic Park
movies.summary: A theme park with genetically engineered dinosaurs goes awry, putting visitors in danger.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.summary: A man with a low IQ witnesses and influences various historical events in the 20th century USA.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.summary: Batman faces a new enemy, The Joker, who seeks chaos in Gotham City.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.summary: A young hobbit, Frodo, is tasked with destroying an evil ring to save Middle-earth.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Inglourious Basterds
movies.summary: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders is hatched.

movies.title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
movies.summary: The adventures of Gustave H, a legendary concierge at a famous hotel, and Zero Moustafa, the lobby boy.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.summary: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: The Room
movies.summary: A melodramatic love triangle, featuring unintentionally humorous acting and dialogue.

movies.title: Catwoman
movies.summary: A shy woman endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat becomes a vigilante.

movies.title: Batman & Robin
movies.summary: Batman and Robin try to prevent the evil pair of Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing the world.

movies.title: Gigli
movies.summary: The unlikely connection between a low-level hood and a Hollywood actress takes unexpected turns.

movies.title: Movie 43
movies.summary: A series of interconnected short films depicting three kids searching the depths of the Internet for the most banned movie in the world.

movies.title: The Martian
movies.summary: Astronaut Mark Watney is stranded on Mars and must figure out how to survive while NASA works to bring him back.

movies.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
movies.summary: Four high school kids discover an old video game console and get sucked into the game's jungle setting.

movies.title: Pacific Rim
movies.summary: In a future where Earth is at war with colossal sea monsters, giant robots piloted by humans are deployed to fight off the menace.

movies.title: Transformers
movies.summary: Alien robots, the Autobots, and Decepticons, bring their battle to Earth, with humans caught in the middle.

movies.title: Men in Black
movies.summary: A secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth recruits a new agent.

movies.title: Shrek
movies.summary: An ogre and his donkey friend embark on a quest to rescue Princess Fiona from a dragon and save their swamp.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.summary: The story of the founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.

movies.title: Independence Day
movies.summary: Earth faces an alien invasion, and humanity must unite to overcome the extraterrestrial threat.

movies.title: Ghostbusters
movies.summary: A group of scientists become ghostbusters to save New York City from paranormal activity.

movies.title: The Hunger Games
movies.summary: In a dystopian future, Katniss Everdeen volunteers to take her sister's place in a televised competition where teenagers fight to the death.
